[SYNTAX]: Occasionally complex, winding sentence structures (e.g., "It is your first day...") may slightly impede immediate clarity.
[LEXICON]: Some archaic or less common terms (e.g., "picklelime", "cod-fish cake") might require brief pauses for unfamiliar readers.

[STRUCTURE]: The narrative jumps between different ages and locations without clear transitional phrases, potentially disorienting readers.
[CLARITY]: Assumptions about the protagonist's thoughts and feelings (e.g., liking a girl with "cute pigtails") are made without fully developed context.

[SYNTAX]: Abrupt sentence transitions (e.g., "The laser display turned off automatically.")
[LEXICON]: Informal tone inconsistencies with formal historical context descriptions
[GRAMMAR]: Minor punctuation issues (e.g., missing articles, inconsistent comma usage)

[STRUCTURE]: Non-linear narrative jumps (e.g., sudden shift from personal story to historical event description)
[CLARITY]: Assuming external knowledge (e.g., "the old army game" without explanation)
[TRANSITION]: Lack of clear connections between some paragraphs (e.g., transition to describing the print shop's move)
